resources.string:
The basic premise of the game is this: 

you roll six dice. Some combinations of dice will 

score points, while others don’t. You take out the 

dice that have scored points and then decide whether to 

keep that score, or re-roll the remaining dice to try to 

score more points. But if you roll again and don’t score 

points, you lose what you’ve earned so far. So the game 

moves quickly and there’s an element of risk that makes 

it really fun to play.
